import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { AuthContext } from '../../auth/AuthContext' import { types } from '../../types/types'; export const Navbar = () => { const {user:{name}} = useContext(AuthContext); const {dispatch} = useContext(AuthContext); const handleLogout = () => { dispatch({ type: types.logout, logged: false }) } return (
Asociaciones
Marvel DC Search
    {name}
) }
